amendment.description: Amendment increases the funding authorized for the National Science Foundation for fiscal years 2000 through 2004 with offsets from the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to authorize a total of $3.6 billion for the NSF for FYs 2000-2004 by transferring $298.6 million from the authorization for DOE.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capuano amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
